name: SoliomHome
0:
”Alexa show my camera”
”Alexa stop my camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Soliom Home is the smart security solution that lets you watch over your doorstep. 

Before you get started, please make sure your Soliom Home device is online. Then enable the Havion Security Skill in Alexa app or ask Alexa to enable the skill by saying "Alexa, enable the Havion Security Skill" and you will be directed to link your Havion account with your Alexa account.

With a Soliom Home camera, you can hear and speak to people in front of your camera from your FireTVs, Echo Show, Echo Spot, Echo Speakers (such as Echo, Echo Plus and Echo Dot). Simply say:

“Alexa, show the front door.”

To stop your feed, say:
“Alexa, stop.”

When Soliom Home is pressed, live view automatically streams on Echo Show along with the Announcement. Toggle to enable Doorbell Announcement is auto enabled. Selecting specific Alexa devices for Motion & Person notifications is available. Multiple Alexa devices can now talk to one camera at the same time.

If you Share your Soliom Home devices with other users in the SoliomHome app, they can use Alexa to see who’s at your home, too.
